name: alder Be Free Cropped Tank - Women's
description:
Be free, do what you want. This breathable tank is soft and stretchy for year-round comfort.Breathable Tencel lyocell feels soft against the skin.Lyocell is made from eucalyptus and oak trees in a closed loop production process.Made at the female-owned and operated Pigeons and Thread factory in Toronto.

        Sustainability






.bluesign-cls-1,.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{fill:none;}.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{stroke:#333;stroke-width:1.79px;}.bluesign-cls-2{stroke-linejoin:round;}.bluesign-cls-3{stroke-miterlimit:10;}
